document.discussion_title: PM-in rawtna thehlut turin mipuite sawm
document.topic_text: PM-in rawtna thehlut turin mipuite sawm Prime Minister Narendra Modi chuan Independence Day-a thuchah a sawi turah sawichhuak tura ngaih pawimawh an neihte thehlut turin mipuite a sawm. A thusawi tur atana rawtna thehlut tura sawmna hi sorkar website hrang hrangah tarlan a ni. Rawtna neite chuaan MyGov open forum, Narendra Modi site leh mobile application hmangin an thehlut thei dawn a, PM hian a lo enfiah dawn niin Personnel Ministry chuan a tarlang. Rawtna hrang hrang zinga a ṭha zual a tihte chu PM hian August 15-a thu a sawinaah a sawi tel ang. Share this Post
